subject: I wish to announce our success
body:
I wish to announce our successful investigation which was carried out
few days ago; I guess it will interest you to know why this
investigation was conducted. For your information, it was truly
confirmed that you have 100% Legitimate unpaid transaction and you
have every right to claim this funds as you have been confirmed to be
the right Beneficiary of the said amount $10.5 Million usd
COMPENSATION/INHERITANCE FUNDS OR NEXT OF KIN. However, Due to the
delay of getting this funds to you, your funds has now been increased
to $11.5 Million United State Dollars approved for payment by
International Monetary Fund (IMF) here in United States.
I am informing you this today because I came to notice that you are
not communicating with a legitimate person who is in charge of getting
these funds to you. This announcement has to be made open to you
however because you may have being swindled by those unscrupulous
people whom you have sent money in the course of getting one fund or
the other which is not real and for this reason, I have decided to
help you get your funds directly from the International Monetary Fund
(IMF) here in United States because your Legitimate funds remains
unpaid.
I want to know if you are interested in receiving your unpaid
legitimate funds value $11.5 Million usd however, I will only be of
help if you agreed to follow my instructions.If you're really
interested in receiving your unpaid $11.5 Million USD, I advise that
you get back to me immediately. All I need is your cooperation and
understanding.
Please you can contact me back on my email by clicking your Reply.
Regards
MR. Patrick Morrisey
UNITED STATES SPECIAL INVESTIGATOR.

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Mr. Patrick Morrisey,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite surprising to hear about these unpaid funds. I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the whole situation.

Could you please provide more details? How did this come about and why was it conducted in the first place? Also, how was it confirmed that I have the right to claim these funds?

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Good day  my friend and sorry for late response. I have engaged the service
of  reliable and experienced delivery Team, to work with DHL Company in
delivering your long awaited fund to you. Your fund originated from the
International Monetary Fund as a compensation and Award Fund. I am the
Attorney in charge of your fund delivery. Your delivery is awarded to you
by IMF and UNCC as winning and Compensation fund.  You reserve an exclusive
rights to claim your award fund. That is how IMF and UNCC has made it.

The delivery is subject to payment of   $350 fee only.  The Fee is meant to
cover the cost of delivery, the cost of filing and obtaining all the
necessary documents pertaining to your fund delivery. Once you send  the
fee of $150, the assigned delivery team will proceed with your fund
delivery to your residence address without any interference. This delivery
is real and legitimate, you have to take it seriously. Thank you.

Patrick Morrisey

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Patrick Morrisey,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this award fund from the IMF and UNCC. I must admit, I'm not entirely familiar with these types of transactions. Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Also, could you provide some more details about the delivery team? How will they ensure the safe delivery of the fund? And regarding the fee, how much is it exactly and what are the payment methods available?

I appreciate your assistance in helping me understand this better.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Good day my  Friend,  like I earlier mentioned, IMF Award is a free and
winning fund. Once you are awarded and it's delivered to you then it
becomes yours in it entirety.

 The issue of delivery team is simple. I will not engage anyone that I
don't know or trust his capacity.  The already assigned delivery team will
work with specifications and mandate.  To ensure easy and effective
delivery,  you will have to provide your full name, your phone number and
address where you to receive your fund. The information mentioned above
will be used to file your fund paperwork and that is the information we
will use to deliver your fund to you.

In sending the payment, you can simply buy Apple gift card $350 from store
and send the card to me here. Attach the picture of the card and it's
receipt on my email here so we can proceed.  Once the card is received, I
will proceed with your fund paperwork filing and then your delivery will
commence.  Thank you for your understanding.

Patrick Morrissey

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Patrick Morrissey,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the IMF Award. It sounds like a wonderful opportunity and I'm thrilled to be considered for it. 

I'm curious, how was I selected for this award? Also, could you please explain more about the delivery team's process? How do they ensure the safety and security of the fund during transit?

Regarding the Apple gift card, could you clarify why this specific type of payment is required? Are there any other methods available?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Your fund was awarded to you as a winning from IMF.  The delivery team is
accountable to me so I will engage some I trust his capacity because I will
account for the delivery after completion. He must be reliable and
trustworthy person.  Before they proceed with your delivery, I will send
you all their contact information as they proceed to deliver your fund.

Apple card payment is well accepted . Make the payment through Apple card
and then forward your choice of address for receiving your delivery,  your
phone number and name. Thank you

Patrick Morrissey

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Patrick Morrissey,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this fund awarded from the IMF. I'm a bit curious though, could you please explain more about how this process works? 

Also, I'm not very familiar with Apple card payments. Could you provide some more details on that as well?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
IMF Award is permanent and non refundable or revocable once the Award
passed to the Awardee( Beneficiary). The award is said to have passed to
you once the documentation and paperwork filing is completed and the fund
is delivered to you.  The fund again is irrevocable once you receive your
delivery.

You can buy Apple gift card from Walmart store or any other store where
gift card are being sold.  Buy the card and send them to my email here with
the receipt given to you at the store. Thank you.

Patrick Morrissey

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Patrick Morrissey,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this fund from the IMF! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about how this works? How was I chosen for this award?

Also, you mentioned an Apple card payment. Could you clarify what this payment is for? Is it related to the delivery process?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
The payment is associated to the paperwork filing and the delivery fee.
Send the pay as I told you then you have your fund delivered.

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello Patrick Morrissey,

Also, you mentioned an Apple card payment. Could you clarify what this payment is for? And why specifically an Apple card?

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Stop repeating questions that have been answered multiple times. Buy the
card as I told you then your delivery will arrive your residence.

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite interested in this process. Could you please explain a bit more about the paperwork filing and delivery fee? How does it work exactly? And what kind of fund will be delivered to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
The paperwork filing is the document of your fund. The documents are
Ownership Certificate and Approval certificate duly certified and sealed.
The delivery fee is all the charges and cost of getting your fund to you.
Send the fee now because all explanation has ended.

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that the paperwork filing is all sorted out and ready to go. I'm a bit curious though, could you please explain more about what these documents entail? What does the Ownership and Approval document mean exactly?

Also, regarding the delivery fee, could you provide a bit more detail on what this covers? I'd like to understand better before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Fred

subject: Re: I wish to announce our success
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about this fund! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about the paperwork filing? What exactly does it mean when you say "Ownership and Approval duly certified and sealed"?

Also, regarding the delivery fee, could you provide more details? How much is it and how is it calculated? Is there any other way to receive the fund without paying this fee?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
